message: Hello Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this excellent product. Given its value, I'm asking for $950,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the benefits it will bring to your business.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value I'm looking to get out of the product.

Bob, I understand your perspective on the value. However, the product's quality and potential warrant a higher price. I'm willing to come down to $900,000. This offer reflects the true worth of what you're gaining.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers. Would you consider selling the product to me for $875,000?
